Rooms.Name: West of House
Rooms.Description: This is an open field west of a white house, with a boarded front door

Rooms.Name: North of House
Rooms.Description: You are facing the north side of a white house. There is no door here, and all the windows are barred.

Rooms.Name: South of House
Rooms.Description: You are facing the south side of a white house. There is no door here, and all the windows are barred.

Rooms.Name: Behind House
Rooms.Description: You are behind the white house. In one corner of the house there is a small window which is slightly ajar.

Rooms.Name: Forest 1
Rooms.Description: This is a forest, with trees in all directions around you. The mouth of a cave appears to the west, but it is forebodingly dark within.

Rooms.Name: Forest 2
Rooms.Description: This is a dimly lit forest, with large trees all around.

Rooms.Name: Forest Cave
Rooms.Description: This is cave, dimly lit as it is, seems grue-free. For now.
Rooms.NoEquipmentMessage: You can't go in a dark cave without a light source. You might be eaten by a grue!

Rooms.Name: Forest 3
Rooms.Description: This is a dimly lit forest, with large trees all around. To the east, there appears to be sunlight.

Rooms.Name: Clearing
Rooms.Description: You are in a clearing, with a forest surrounding you on the west and south.

WorldObjects.Name: Key
WorldObjects.WorldDescription: There's a brass key sitting on the ground.
WorldObjects.ExamineDescription: This key looks like it would go to a chest.

WorldObjects.Name: Keycard
WorldObjects.WorldDescription: There's a plastic keycard sitting on the ground.
WorldObjects.ExamineDescription: This keycard looks like it would go to an electronic lock.

WorldObjects.Name: Chest
WorldObjects.WorldDescription: There's a chest sitting on the ground.
WorldObjects.ExamineDescription: This chest looks like a key would go to it.

WorldObjects.Name: Locker
WorldObjects.WorldDescription: There's a locker sitting on the ground.
WorldObjects.ExamineDescription: This locker looks very out of place in this cave. It seems to be fitted with an electronic card reader.

WorldObjects.Name: Jewel
WorldObjects.WorldDescription: There's a jewel sitting on the ground.
WorldObjects.ExamineDescription: This jewel looks like it's worth a lot of money.

WorldObjects.Name: Lantern
WorldObjects.WorldDescription: There's a lantern sitting on the ground.
WorldObjects.ExamineDescription: This lantern looks like it could light up a room. Or something that only counts as a room for the purposes of this adventure.
